nodes.text: Yarum seeds were a variety of seeds found on the swamp planet of Dagobah. During the many years he spent on self-imposed exile on Dagobah, the Jedi Master Yoda notably lived off yarum seeds, which he gathered in a part of the forest between his house and the Dragonsnake Bog. Around 34 ABY, Kat Saka owned several bags of Yarum seeds as part of her large collection of spices used in her special Outpost Mix.
